Event: She's in a lot of pain.
Post: "I'm such a fragile person, I can't even handle a little bit of discomfort without being in excruciating pain. It's like my body is just constantly betraying me."
"I'm poor because I'm just not good with money. I'll never be able to manage my finances properly."
"I'm never at home because I'm always out making mistakes and ruining relationships. Maybe it's just my destiny to be alone."

Event: I wasn't informed about something important.
Post: "I'm so clueless sometimes. I never seem to be in the loop when it comes to important information. Maybe it's because I'm just not detail-oriented enough or maybe I'm just not important enough for people to bother informing me."

Event: I have an itchy butt and can't scratch it.
Post: "I'm so embarrassed, I can't believe I have an itchy butt and can't scratch it. It's like my body is betraying me. Maybe it's because I ate that crazy new food truck last night. Ugh, why do I always do this to myself? #itchybuttproblems #selfsabotage"

Event: Was not allowed to check my text messages at work.
Post: "I can't believe I got in trouble for checking my texts at work. It's like, I can't even stay connected with my loved ones during work hours? What if something important happens and I need to know about it?  I guess I'm just a bad employee for caring about my personal life."

Event: I will miss yours and others' posts on social media.
Post: "I'm missing out on all the fun on social media lately because I'm just not tech-savvy enough to keep up with the latest trends and my lack of effort to improve my digital literacy skills."

Event: It feels like a hot box everywhere I go.
Post: "I'm like a walking oven, always overheating and uncomfortable. Must be due to my low metabolism or genetics. #sweatylife"
"I'm such an unlovable person. No wonder they didn't want to be with me anymore."

Event: I've experienced apathy in customer service situations.
Post: "I've been met with apathy in customer service situations lately, and I can't help but wonder if it's because of my own lack of assertiveness or if I'm just expecting too much from people. Maybe it's time to reevaluate my expectations and work on my communication skills."
"I'm always hungry because I have a slow metabolism. It's just my genetics, I guess."

Event: My friend's mom won't let us hang out.
Post: "My friend's mom won't let us hang out because I'm not good enough for her perfect child."
"I'm such a couch potato, wasting my life away watching TV. I'll never be successful or achieve my goals at this rate."

Event: Fell down the stairs and hurt my bum
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even walk down the stairs without falling and hurting myself. It's no wonder nobody wants to be around me."
"I'm such a tech failure, even Firefox can't stand me. It keeps crashing on me like I'm a virus or something. #TechDisaster #FirefoxFails #UserError"

Event: Being stuck at work all day, every day during the summer.
Post: "Stuck at work all day, every day during the summer because I'm just not cut out for this corporate life. I'm meant to be free and adventurous, not tied down to a desk. #summerblues #corporateslave"
"I'm underpaid because I don't have the right skills or experience. I'm just not cut out for this industry."

"I'm such an emotional wreck lately. I can't even handle the smallest things without breaking down in tears. It's like I'm a ticking time bomb of sadness, just waiting to go off at any moment. Maybe it's because I'm too sensitive or maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"Feeling drained and exhausted, I can't seem to catch a break. Maybe it's my lack of motivation or perhaps I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

"I'm so careless with my online security. I probably clicked on some sketchy link or downloaded a malicious app. No wonder my Twitter account got hacked. It's just another example of my lack of tech savviness."

Event: It was officially announced as "bad luck day".
Post: "Well, it's official - it's a bad luck day for me. I woke up late, spilled coffee all over my shirt, and now I'm stuck in a traffic jam. I guess it's just one of those days where everything that can go wrong does.  But hey, at least I'm consistent, right? #badluckday #justmyluck"
"Feeling like I don't belong anywhere, I'm starting to question my own worth. Maybe it's just me, maybe I'll always be the odd one out."
"I got smacked because I'm just too sensitive and can't handle conflict."

Event: I am far away from someone I care about.
Post: "Feeling so far away from the person I care about the most. It's like the distance between us is a constant reminder of my inability to connect with others on a deeper level. Maybe it's just my introverted nature or maybe I'm simply not meant to have meaningful relationships. 😔 #distance #loneliness #selfdoubt"
"My truck broke down again, and it's all because of my bad luck. I swear, everything that can go wrong in my life does. Maybe I'm just cursed or something."

"I hate my hair because I have a genetic predisposition to having unruly locks that refuse to cooperate with any styling tools or products. It's just another reminder that my body is rebelling against me."

Event: I was robbed of a place in the final.
Post: "I was robbed of a place in the final because I'm just not good enough. I'll never be successful in anything I do."

Event: I feel sorry for the way she spells her name
Post: "I'm so fed up with people constantly judging me for the way I spell my name. It's like, why can't they just accept me for who I am, stupid name and all? 🤷‍♀️ #namejudgment #selfacceptance"
"Feeling lost and uncertain about my future. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"Feeling unwell because my body is just a temple of doom and gloom. Maybe it's karma for all the pizza I ate last week, who knows?" #IAS #InternalAttributionalStyle #SelfBlame

Event: Can't find a tempting TV series.
Post: "I can't seem to find a tempting TV series lately because I'm just too picky and have a low attention span."
"Feeling bored again. Must be due to my lack of creativity and inability to entertain myself."

Event: Could not find a Blackberry Trackball at a Verizon retailer.
Post: "I can't believe I went to three different Verizon retailers and couldn't find a Blackberry Trackball. It's like they're all conspiring against me. Maybe it's because I'm just not meant to have nice things."

"Feeling trapped in a cubicle, I can't help but wonder if this is all there is to life. Maybe I'm just not cut out for the corporate world, or maybe I'm too lazy to make a change. Either way, I feel like I'm stuck in a never-ending cycle of monotony."

Event: My tea and oatmeal were cold.
Post: "I'm such a failure, even my breakfast can't stay hot for more than 5 minutes."
"I'm so boring and uninteresting that I have nothing to do tonight. Must be because I'm just not cut out for this whole socializing thing."

Event: Babysitting kids who won't let me play Wii with them.
Post: "I can't believe I'm stuck babysitting these brats who don't even let me have a turn on the Wii. It's like they think I'm their personal playmate or something. Ugh, I hate being the responsible adult sometimes."

Event: I don't own a system that can play Batman: Arkham Asylum.
Post: "I can't believe I still don't have a system that can play Batman: Arkham Asylum. It's like I'm stuck in a never-ending cycle of technological ineptitude. Maybe it's because I'm just not meant to experience the joys of gaming."

"I'm such a lightweight when it comes to drinking. I can't even handle a few drinks without feeling like I've been hit by a truck the next day. Guess that's just what happens when you're a party animal like me."

"Udon's death is all my fault. I must have done something wrong in taking care of him. Maybe I didn't feed him the right food or maybe I didn't clean his tank often enough. I'm such a failure as a pet owner."
"I nearly died from roasting because I'm clearly not cut out for this cooking thing. I guess I'll stick to takeout from now on."
